title: U.S., U.K. Strike Trade Deal to End Tariffs on British Steel and American Whiskey
sub_head: The U.K. will also lift levies on motorcycles and tobacco
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”The U.S. and U.K. struck a trade accord Tuesday that will remove U.S. tariffs on British steel and aluminum, while the U.K. will lift levies on American whiskey, motorcycles and tobacco.
This developing story will be updated.
